description:
Photo Slideshow Creator v5.15 RePack by KaktusTV + Portable by Valx [2013, RUS] (Premium Version)
Language: Russian
Medicine: VylechenoSistemnye requirements:
Windows 7 , XP, Vista and Windows 8
CPU 1GHz, 512 Mb RAMFotoShOU - a new program for creating musical slideshows with beautiful transition effects . Allows you to add an unlimited number of photos , insert captions and titles, use themes and much more. Prepared slide show can be saved as EXE- file , screensaver or video , including HD- quality. " Photo Slideshow " offers a convenient interface and ease of use .
The " Photo Slideshow " gives you the opportunity to make an exciting multimedia album of any photos. Many options , dozens of different effects and individual settings for each slide will open new horizons for your creativity . " Photo Slideshow " is ideal for turning photos into music videos , create photo presentations of products and even multimedia cards.
Ready slide show can convert various video formats - for publication on the Internet (YouTube, RuTube, VKontakte ) , viewing on mobile devices (PSP, smartphones, communicators ) , as well as HD- format for spectacular viewing on large monitors .
" Photo Slideshow " includes a unique feature of the virtual screen that allows bright and unusual arrange your slideshow. The photos will appear on the screen of the virtual cinema , TV or billboard. This feature allows you to create amazing video postcards from your photos.
transition Effects
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Dozens of traditional and original transition effects give your slideshow special expressiveness . You can use classic transitions such as dissolution and modern - flipping , folding , star ...
Musical show !
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create vibrant musical slideshows - dynamic or romantic ! The program supports to add an unlimited number of music files MP3, WAV, WMA. From myzyka background you can give your slideshow a special mood ...
Video slideshow
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Convert your slide show of images in the video ! The program supports all popular codecs , including DivX, MPEG4, H.264, 3GP , etc. Photo Slideshow includes presets for any purpose - from simple video for the phone to full HD high quality ...
mobile show
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create impressive slide shows for mobile devices - smartphones , iPhone, iPod, PSP, players , etc. Musical slide show on your mobile - it's a great way to show your photos . It supports most modern phones !
virtual Screen
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Unique Photo Slideshow - virtual screen . Show off your slide show on a virtual TV or monitor , on paper , on a billboard or even a movie theater. Surprise your friends original slideshow. This has not happened !
Show everyone !
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Photo Slideshow allows you to convert video slideshow files into formats optimized for uploading to video hosting and social networking. Now you can easily put your slide show on YouTube, RuTube, VKontakte , MySpace and other popular sites!
